Product: LG Electronics (22LJ4540) 22-Inch Class Full HD 1080p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Robert F
review_detail.title: Works off a 12V battery in a boat or RV with a DC/DC 12V to 19V boost converter
review_detail.content: I'm putting this in my boat for both TV and a computer display (1920x1080p).  This seems to be a good alternative to the 12V TVs that are currently available. The trick is to add a Aweking Waterproof DC/DC 12V Step Up to 19V 4A 76W Voltage Boost Converter Regulator (tv seems to draw only about an amp, so 4A is an overkill).  Time will tell if it will hold up to vibration and moisture.  The display is not the brightest but considering the low power consumption I'm pleased with it.

Product: LG Electronics (22LJ4540) 22-Inch Class Full HD 1080p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: bbkong
review_detail.title: Meh.
review_detail.content: You never know what you're going to get with these cheap monitors. It works and looks fine but it comes with an audio assistant that tells you what button you just pressed on the remote and it took 2 days to figure out how to shut her up. It also makes an annoying T Mobile kinda sound when you power up or off. CAVEAT: no audio output, not even a headphone jack. You have to listen to those tinny little onboard speakers instead of the nice stereo you just put in your shop, and that ruins your Youtube playlist. More product detail on the page WOULD BE REAL NICE.

Product: LG Electronics (22LJ4540) 22-Inch Class Full HD 1080p LED TV (2017 Model)

Product: LG Electronics (22LJ4540) 22-Inch Class Full HD 1080p LED TV (2017 Model)

Product: LG Electronics (22LJ4540) 22-Inch Class Full HD 1080p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Maurice C. Valley
review_detail.title: I replaced my old 19 inch CRT tv with this one.
review_detail.content: I replaced my old 19 inch CRT tv with this one. The tv stand just slides into the tv requiring no clamps or screws or anything. Once assembled the tv is stable. After plugging in the power cord and the hdmi cable from my cable card equipped Tivo to the tv and turning it on all I got was static on the tv screen and a request to scan for channels by an annoying voice speaking way too fast. After the tv scanned for channels it said it found none. Great. I thought it was going to be easy to set the tv up. I ended up having to call LG user help and the nice person who answered explained that I had to press the input button on the remote and then change the input from the antenna option to the hdmi option. As soon as I did that I had all of my channels. I wish the tv manual had been more specific about that step in setting-up the tv.

Product: LG Electronics (22LJ4540) 22-Inch Class Full HD 1080p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: P. trainor
review_detail.title: This one was a lemon!
review_detail.content: Even with the assistance of LG customer support the TV would not function. Since this occurred upon receipt of the item I opted to return it to Amazon rather than to have it repaired.  Amazon rep was excellent with their response. I received a return label from Amazon and credit to my acct. almost immediately. A lot of time wasted waiting for an item that wouldn't work.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: M. Ridgaway
review_detail.title: Great TV, Terrible Quality Assurance, Apathetic Customer Support
review_detail.content: I really want to love the TCL 6 series 55". When this TV looks good, it looks really good. Unfortunately, as several other reviewers have noted, a significant portion of these sets suffer from vertical banding and Dirty Screen Effect, or DSE.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: A Robust and Impressive 4k TV
review_detail.content: This tv is fantastic, and I'm not saying that lightly.  Even regarding the value price it can contend with TVs that are hundreds of dollars more. It has deep blacks, vibrant colors, great contrast, above average motion performance, decent brightness, rather impressive build quality, and acceptable sound quality. The addition of motion interpretation was a much needed feature, and I'm glad to see it on this tv.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Barry J. Gervais
review_detail.title: I love this TV colors are great and deep blacks
review_detail.content: I see a lot of people complain about Vertical Banding but i don't see it when watching normal live TV or Streaming. I do all my viewing via Streaming, and that's the biggest reason for me getting this TCL Roku TV

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Aaron
review_detail.title: Best bang for your buck tv!
review_detail.content: Im really impresses with the quality of the tv. My old tv was a samsung 1080p. Im mesmerized whenever I see the hdr in action. The blacks truly look black and it can get pretty bright when it needs to. The roku OS is simple to use and fast. The netfix app supports dolby vision and the YouTube app supports 4k HDR. I have an xbox x and it just looks amazing. I attached a picture with the 4k tv details on the xbox one x. Im really happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend it especially if you're coming from a 1080p. The difference is night and day.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Andre
review_detail.title: Gorgeous picture but will require some "tweaking" in the "color controls"
review_detail.content: I will admit we've had this TV for all of two weeks :)  but I'm pretty good about updating my reviews so even if you see this same review years later assume we're still happy with the TV  :)

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: L. E. Carter
review_detail.title: Great picture, but some other issues
review_detail.content: Great blacks. Whites perhaps lack perfection. When the TV was first unboxed and on its leg stands, we did see some banding on single color Test Screens (found on Youtube), but not especially bad. We knew to check for banding since it took 4 weeks from ordering to receiving this TV and we had seen reviews talking about banding. Anyway, we wanted to give the TV a chance... half a day later after the TV was mounted above the fireplace, there was no banding. Two weeks later, if we look really hard at a single color screen {which we would never do except for a review} we can see bright spots from the 120 backlights.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Mathew Miller
review_detail.title: Terrible TCL customer service!!
review_detail.content: I did a lot of research before buying this TV.  TCL has gotten a good reputation for having high quality at a low price.  I had bad banding on both sides of my screen when light colors were shown (see pic) so I contacted TCL’s customer service.  The girl on the phone told me that’s normal.  I wouldn’t accept that answer so she had me send some pictures and they would email me back.  I was shocked at the response (see email pic)!  The fact that their service department doesn’t see any defect is insulting to me.  After reading other Amazon reviews it seems like this is a serious issue for some but not all.  I liked everything about this TV and would love to get a replacement that doesn’t have this issue but I told them I would never buy one of their products again.  If they can’t admit to something so obvious why take the risk.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: JB
review_detail.title: Blown Away by the TCL 65" 6 Series TV
review_detail.content: I finally was able to get this TV a month after ordering it. Amazon delivery sent 2 movers who delivered it, unpacked it, attached the stand, plugged it up to make sure it worked and removed all the packaging. The TV is amazing in regards to the build quality, the ROKU operating system and the picture quality. The TV stand has the feet on the ends of the TV and just enough height, so it allowed me to place my JBL 3.1 soundbar directly underneath the TV for a clean finished look, while still having amazing sound. The remote is improved in its design and function. Amazon sells the premium version with the RF remote so you can point it anywhere and the TV will pick up the signal, unlike the BB version which comes with an IR remote and has to be pointed directly at the sensor on the TV or it won't work. The TCL remote is also slightly flatter and wider then previous TCL TV remotes and it fits in your hand better. They also made the play/pause button larger and with a slight indentation so you can work it in complete darkness simply by feel, which is great! Set up of the TV was a breeze with the ROKU operating system and basic picture adjustments are simple and straightforward using the TCL remote. You will need to download the ROKU app to make more intricate picture setting changes, but it too is very easy to use.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: The picture quality is amazing coming from a 10+ year old plasma
review_detail.content: Coming from a LG 42PC5D this is a massive upgrade. While I am not an expert, I have tested a couple games (Witcher 3 and Forza 7) and watched some video from various sources (Youtube, Amazon, and Netflix). The picture quality is amazing coming from a 10+ year old plasma. Input lag is low in game mode, but the picture quality is a bit worse (mainly black uniformity is not as good, while in non-game mode it seems to be nearly perfect). I was worried about black levels not being as good as a plasma tv or OLED, but that doubt quickly faded away. The blacks are extremely dark, colors are vibrant, and the image is especially crisp. From my limited time with the tv so far, I am blown away with the value you get here. I will update my review after I calibrate the tv (out of the box it looks stunning, so if you don't like to mess with settings to get a great picture look not further) and get to spend some more time with it.

Product: TCL 65R617 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: goosedude
review_detail.title: Performance and Picture at a true value price
review_detail.content: Excellent ROKU OS and intuitive remote. I had waited for the discount on the 55R617 for awhile and was happy to pounce when it went on sale. One of the best TV values I have bought in years. While it does not have the superior sound of the 2017 55C807, the 6 series improved styling/case and bright screen are true improvements vs the P series. 4K and HDR look wonderful on the set. I do wish that the remote did have # buttons and that when 4K content is input there was an indicator that everything is working correctly (you have to kinda have a source that tells you). My XBOX ONE X looks excellent and 4K / HDR Netflix and other video services pop (See PLANET EARTH 2 on Netflix for an example).

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Elizabeth Fancher
review_detail.title: Great TV for the price
review_detail.content: This TV is great, picture quality is great and it just looks nice. We really like that it doesn’t rely on WiFi but you can use it I believe. The only things we don’t like is that the apps are limited (we can’t figure out how to add more at least but I just set my Steam link up and use my computer for anything else) and to access the apps (unless you’re switching to YouTube or Netflix, those you get buttons for) you press the home button which means when you’re in an app you have to exit to home, then press home again which is completely unnecessary, every smart TV remote should have a app button. We even looked at the manual to make sure we didn’t miss a button. BUT for how much we paid we’re pleased and only took off a star for the inability to add apps.

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.content: Great TV for the money.  Deep black, vivid colors, great refresh speed.  Easy to navigate the apps.... No issues at all.  Fingers crossed it lasts!

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Mariola A.
review_detail.title: Not worth the hassle
review_detail.content: The TV shuts itself off and the only way to restart it is to unplug everything and plug it back in. It keeps happening though sometimes every minute, other times it is on for a whole 20 minutes. Yay! Spoke to Sony Tech support, did the software upgrade and it still didn't work.  Sony solution was that their engineers will call me within 3 business days (there is a weekend in between those days) to do the additional troubleshooting and I should wait by the TV in case they do call. When I asked if I should take three days off from work to wait for them to call me back they confirmed with all the seriousness. They do not have solution for this issue. Amazon was great in sending someone back to pickup this TV.

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Tom Gleason
review_detail.title: Great picture! YouTube 4K content looks excellent on most ...
review_detail.content: Great picture! YouTube 4K content looks excellent on most posted 4K Ultra and HDR videos. The problemed videos I chalk up to bad compression by the poster. The default sound settings require tweaking for excellent TV sound from the set. Most will just add full surround sound externally. It is not a full Android TV (Smart TV) version and there are some limitations but most of the big name streaming services are available. There is currently no full function browser, but I'd say it is plenty functional for most. I did not want integrated Android TV as I prefer to use external Android TV boxes that meet my own hardware specs and allows for Android version upgrades. Currently, I run nVidia Shield and H96 Pro external boxes with excellent streaming results and picture quality.

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.title: Well I bought this TV on March 14. THe ...
review_detail.content: Well I bought this TV on March 14.  THe return window closed on April 13.  And the support window closed on May 13.  And on May 15 the screen started blacking out.  It works normally for a few minutes, then the screen goes black for 1 second and then comes back on  10 seconds later it goes black for one second and immediatly comes back on.  And this continues.  All channels.  All HDMI inputs.  Even Internet Amazon Video or YouTube.

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

Not to mention, the volume is ridiculously low. I have to crank it up to 60+ to be able to hear it halfway decently. Furthermore, the TV arrived without the required screws to secure it to the base and Sony was of no help. I ended up having to purchase a variety set of universal TV screws and hope it included the correct size since nowhere did the instructions say what size the screws were. A lot of hassle and extra time for a mediocre TV. Wouldn't buy again.

Product: Sony KD43X720E 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.title: Makes me motion sick
review_detail.content: So far I love almost everything. I have turned off reality creation, motionflow, and cineMotion yet whenever I watch things on Netflix or Amazon, the motion (like someone is drunk while filming) makes me extremely motion sick still. I’ve even turned off all noise reduction. I don’t know what else to do. Am I missing a setting? I can’t even access advanced settings. Still trying to figure out how to get there. Can anyone help please. It doesn’t seem to have a problem with regular TV so far. Please help Sony or someone who has fixed this problem.

Product: Samsung 49NU8000 Flat 49” 4K UHD 8 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.author: Jim
review_detail.title: My UN55NU8000 has a Beautiful Picture but has a Sound Problem
review_detail.content: I ordered it on Monday and it was delivered on Wednesday. I mounted it on my new stand and was watching it that afternoon. I am not very technically oriented and have not yet managed to completely set it up and that may be part of my problem in selecting what I want to use as the input but eventually, I manage to get see my computer or Hard Disk Players, but it usually takes me a while to manage that. Like I said, the picture is beautiful but the second day, the sound from my Speaker System suddenly started sounding sort of like a studdering. This happened while I was playing a recorded program from my HDD player. I stopped the playback and then restarted it and the sound was all right again. This has happened a number of times since then. Earlier today I was watching an over the air broadcast and for the first time, the OTA sound started the studdering and in order to get it to stop, I had to turn off the channel and then go back to it. I am old and I wear hearing aids in both ears so what I hear may not sound too me like it would to someone else. The fact that I have been unable to completely set up the NU8000 could possibly be part of the problem, however, having read the reviews, quite a few of them mention a sound coming from their NU8000's also. I have previously bought seven Samsung TV,s, this one being number eight and there had never been a problem with any of the previous seven.

Product: Samsung 49NU8000 Flat 49” 4K UHD 8 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.title: The Samsung nu8000 4k smart TV is amazing

The no gap wall mount and clean cable soulution makes for a very clean finished product.  The 4k ultra HD make watching sports or gaming an even better experience. I am so happy with my new Samsung I can't wait to watch some football.  You can't go wrong with the NU8000

I utilized the TV stand which was very intuitive to attach, just a few screws. The base is a little awkward in it's design as it the main support arm sits in front of the TV, just something to get use to.  For me, this is my first TV with built in WIFI.  The TV quickly identified my network and I was logged in and finding my apps in no time.  I use DirectTV Now as a streaming service which is one of the many prepopulated apps on the TV.  Just a power cord to be up and running with live TV and Netflix?  Awesome.

Product: Samsung 49NU8000 Flat 49” 4K UHD 8 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.title: Made a great wedding anniversary present for my parents.  They love their new Smart TV!

They are more than happy with it and it has exceeded their expectations of a TV.  This is actually their first Smart TV and they are enjoying all of the great features it offers. Best Anniversary gift ever!

review_detail.author: jenna
review_detail.title: Returned TV
review_detail.content: I've had to update this review a couple times, ultimately ended up returning TV. Here's the saga:

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: GTX USER
review_detail.title: Very happy with this purchase!
review_detail.content: This was the first new TV I ever bought. Up until now, it has been hand-me-downs and used TVs for cheap. I was extremely dismayed when the first unit I received was broken. However the return and replacement process was easy, free and only took 2 days before the replacement arrived. It was shipped in the original box which is very well packaged, so I think the first TV was just a fluke. It is a brightly colored TV box though, so the delivery person will probably not leave it at your door. I had to be present for UPS to drop off. But they didn't make me sign anything, so it might be hit or miss in your area. Keep that in mind when ordering.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Keith B.
review_detail.title: So Far So Good 👍
review_detail.content: Well, it has been running six plus hours a day 4 - 5 nights a week for a while now and although I know other buyers have had issues this TV has been great. Out of the box it was four screws to put on the two reasonably sturdy feet. Connectors for power and HDMI were easily accessible. Setup was confusing at first. This is supposed to primarily be a Roku/streaming TV although it can work just fine with you cable or satellite provider's set top box. Included instructions didn't have a bypass the online setup section but TCL support quickly walked me through getting the TV connected to the cable box. Image quality is stunning. I was honestly amazed at how bright, vibrant and saturated the picture is. Sound quality is good, nothing spectacular but it does go loud which was a necessity as my mother, the primary user, is going deaf and at full volume couldn't hear her previous TV. She hears this set perfectly and there's plenty of volume left if her hearing issues worsen. I would recommend this set to anyone looking for an affordable TV.

review_detail.author: Amazon shopper
review_detail.title: Got this to use Netflix.. Netflix crashes repeatedly.
review_detail.content: I'm incredibly frustrated with this product. I don't have cable so I got this to use streaming channels like Netflix, but the Netflix app on the Roku is so ridiculously glitchy it's not even worth having the TV anymore. Every 5-10 minutes, the app crashes and reverts to the home screen. It is not a problem with Netflix as it's working fine on my phone and laptop. I did some research and found that many other people have been having the exact same issue. I never leave negative reviews but this is egregious. Fix your system with an update that addresses this problem and I will update my rating accordingly.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Daniel.Y
review_detail.title: Never buy this product.
review_detail.content: I am changing my rate from 5 stars to 1 star. Its been just a month since I purchased this item. It is now keep rebooting so I had to plug the power off. When I switch it on, it infinitely reboots itself. Boots --> Freeze --> Reboot --> Freeze --> Reboot. Terrible.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Big Dog
review_detail.title: I have several smart LG TVs and a Vizio
review_detail.content: I have several smart LG TVs and a Vizio. They are all great. However this is the best TV I have ever owned. I purchased it for a room that did not have a tv and took a chance. Easy to set up, great picture and sound. For the price it cannot be beat.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Chester Allen
review_detail.title: One Star
review_detail.content: Two months and it is toast.  Not able to detect Wifi

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Samantha Rummel
review_detail.title: Excellent little TV!!
review_detail.content: This is actually a great little TV! I had a bit of an issue setting it up because my internet provider was the issue, but I contacted the customer service number on the box and they were FABULOUS... this TV will let you (very easily) set up your directv, cable boxes, DVD players, and has a button for Amazon, Netflix, sets up your Hulu... The volume is very sufficient... It's just a great TV for your bedroom, guest room, kid's room... And the price is terrific... I'll definitely purchase another one for my guest room.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Sharon Stillson
review_detail.title: Wasted money
review_detail.content: I bought this to replace a Samsung Smart TV. I had the Samsung for several years it worked wonderfully and I planned on purchasing another. Then when I read some of the reviews for the TLC especially in light of the price, I decided to try it. From day one it was a disappointment. The ad says easy to use remote. That's a joke. What about this remote is easy? First it's so limited it doesn't even have a control for volume. I end up switching back and forth between several remotes. Yes the app is an interesting but only when it works.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: great connectivity, image quality
review_detail.content: Just make sure you know what you are buying this TV for. If streaming is your thing, look no further. This set is relatively basic but everything is there: great connectivity, image quality, decent sound, comfortable controls, lightweight. My only regrets? I should have spent a bit more to get 4k instead of 1080P and maybe bigger size. It is surprisingly lightweight, modern looking and relatively slim. I would have gone with more sophisticated (and expensive) Samsung for things like live TV and gaming but this one is king for your streaming needs.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: M. Gibbs
review_detail.title: TV and Computer Monitor - works well for both uses!
review_detail.content: My main purpose in buying this TV was to use as a large computer monitor when I'm working on these massive spreadsheets and powerpoint presentations that are my world.  The second use was as an actual TV.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: worked out well for me
review_detail.content: when my mom's complex upgraded there in house TV antenna system Suddenly she needed a digital TV. This  TCL 32S305 32-Inch unit  seemed to fit the bill nicely and the price was very right. The Rocu remote was pretty "old lady friendly" (not to many buttons) but I expect her to get lost in the endless menus, However finding the antenna is not hard and when u turn off  when set to TV/antenna it restarts on TV.

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: G. Hill
review_detail.title: Can't wait to replace this one
review_detail.content: PRO: The picture is very good. The Black Friday price and the delivery were great. Roku is the number one streaming device for good reason. It has all the cool stuff I loved about my Roku stick. The purchase of a TV integrated with Roku seemed like a good idea at the time, however…

Product: TCL 28S305 28-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Bonbon
review_detail.title: Hello TCL!
review_detail.content: This is my first Smart TV. Let me tell you, I am impressed. It connects to internet even with the weakest signal. You can install an app on your smartphone and use smartphone as your remote. Picture quality is great on all free and paid online services. I tried YouTube without creating an account and quality is not acceptable. I guess creating an account would let me pick quality. Or maybe watching through the web browser installed on TV? It is my first month with this Smart TV and I feel I should have bought it earlier. Never had TCL products before. Always been a huge Sony fan, but guess what, this TV is as good as Sony TV I was checking at the store. Overall, I am enjoying every minute of watching this TV. We will see how long it will last.

Product: Samsung Electronics UN32N5300AFXZA 32" 1080p Smart LED TV (2018), Black

review_detail.author: Karen Tyler
review_detail.title: Five Stars
review_detail.content: Good color. No problem with installation . Great for my bedroom!

Product: Samsung Electronics UN32N5300AFXZA 32" 1080p Smart LED TV (2018), Black

review_detail.author: Amy
review_detail.title: Happy with purchase
review_detail.content: Arrived on time - happy with purchase

Product: Samsung Electronics UN32N5300AFXZA 32" 1080p Smart LED TV (2018), Black

review_detail.author: Lee Phillips
review_detail.title: Ok but not great.
review_detail.content: Fairly easy to install. Problem with quality of sound. Picture quality great.

Product: Samsung Electronics UN32N5300AFXZA 32" 1080p Smart LED TV (2018), Black

review_detail.author: SM
review_detail.title: Nice TV
review_detail.content: My 2015, Samsung stopped working, so...

Product: Samsung Electronics UN32N5300AFXZA 32" 1080p Smart LED TV (2018), Black

review_detail.author: JMF12345
review_detail.title: Samsung used to make good tvs
review_detail.content: If you want a sharp picture, this is not the set for you. I found the quality to be about what you would expect from an over-the-air broadcast station you bring in with an antenna on your roof. I couldn't stand to watch it. I sent it back and the seller gave me a full refund, which is the only good thing I can say about this tv.

Product: Samsung Electronics UN32N5300AFXZA 32" 1080p Smart LED TV (2018), Black

review_detail.author: Sledge
review_detail.title: Not User Friendly 'Smart'?
review_detail.content: Bought this at 'B-Buy'. Kept it two days. Traded it for '5500 Series'. Talked to Samsung.. [Said] What you get? Is what you get!

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: JS
review_detail.title: Gamers beware bad dirty screen effect, and HDR10 implementation
review_detail.content: Parts of this review pertain to the 49-inch model of the 517, but may apply to the 43 as well.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: ebkw8
review_detail.title: Great product for a great price
review_detail.content: After returning from a vacation, I discovered that a power surge killed my 26" flat screen TV that I purchased 10 years ago as a present to myself for getting a masters degree. I am a frugal guy, so the splurge of spending 400+ dollars 10 years ago was a big purchase for me. The same purchase amount got me a TV nearly twice the size and 5x better picture quality.  After returning from vacation to find the TV not working, I ran out to Walmart for a Phillips replacement. I returned it a week later as the picture quality was terrible as compared to the TCL I now have. TCL may not be a mainstream brand for electronics, but I can tell you that you will not be disappointed with this set.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Robert J Mabrito
review_detail.title: Excellent 4k UHD picture!
review_detail.content: Great TV value and outstanding picture.  Now if we can only get the networks to provide more 4k content.  Very happy with this purchase.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: MattReader
review_detail.title: Picture quality is decent
review_detail.content: I'm not a big fan of the Roku platform but I bought this for my mom and she uses an AppleTV so I just hooked that up too.  This way if there is an issue with the AppleTV she can just use the built in Roku platform.  The TV itself has a good picture.  It's not like our OLED tv but for a mid-range it's pretty clear.  Of course Amazon delivered it in 2 days which made buying this tv well worth it.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Kevin Mcmanus
review_detail.title: At $480.00, This is a Steal !!!
review_detail.content: Pros:

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: BigB
review_detail.title: Awesome value! Very Happy!
review_detail.content: I’m very happy with the TV. I originally looked at the entry level model at Costco. Even that model had a better image than other well known brands in the isle. The only thing that looked cheap was the frame and logo. I decided to go with the 55” 517 model from Amazon which has a thinner bezel and the TCL logo is nicer. The panel is a step up as well. The picture is incredible! Roku works well and my wife is enjoying the channels. I connected the HDMI ARC port to my new Samsung Sound Bar’s ARC and can control the sound from the cable remote without any further configuration. The sound turns on and off with the TV. I also added Bias lighting to the rear. The only drawback is that the USB port powering the bias lighting takes 15min to go off after the TV is put in standby. The bottom of the TV has a deeper depth than the top, which is very thin. This left room me to mount and hide my cable box behind the TV on the upper left side. Overall this TV is an awesome value. The quality is equal to or better than others and at a better price point.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Andres Camarena
review_detail.title: Great for console and online gaming
review_detail.content: I wanted a display that could get HDR out of my PS4 Pro and that could be used for online gaming. Setting it up was easy and it works flawlessly with my PS4 Pro. Getting the optimum resolution and framerate was slightly annoying when mirroring my laptop (it was displaying 4k at 30 Hz and I wanted 60 Hz). An article had a series of steps that worked for me. On the TV I manually changed the HDMI inputs to 2.0, restarted the TV in settings, and then I went to the NVIDIA control panel on my laptop to change to 4k at 60 Hz. Playing Overwatch on this display (through HDMI connection from my laptop) was just as comfortable as playing from my laptop directly. It's done everything I've wanted and the price was great. I very highly recommend.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: SeaKatMV
review_detail.title: Easy and affordable
review_detail.content: Easy for this mom to unpack, put together and set up. I did it in under 20 minutes and now we’re beyond thrilled with this purchase. I was a little scared to replace our 10 year old Sony with this but am so pleased we picked this. For the price it’s a steal! You get so much with this. Love the simplicity of everything and love that all my entertainment apps are all on my tv. I don’t have to go to different rooms to watch amazon prime and Netflix, they’re both on this TV!

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Sogi-Ya
review_detail.title: the 43" form factor is actually better than the 48" (that was just a bit too ...
review_detail.content: I bought this to use as a oversized monitor for my gaming PC: I used this to replace a 48" 1080p TV that I had been using & on top of the 4K screen having a much higher DPI, the 43" form factor is actually better than the 48" (that was just a bit too big).

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: Very good picture and great Roku OS, but finding a mount was really hard.  Not as easy as just finding a VESA 200x200
review_detail.content: [Updated May 18, 2018]  Awesome Roku operating system.  The picture is very good but took forever to get the picture just the way I wanted it.  If you get the skin tones the way you want it, then some reds are off.  If you get the reds good, then the greens are off, and so on...... So unless you spend a lot of time working on the settings, you will have a compromise.  I spent the time and the picture looks very good now.  You also need to configure the picture for each input source, which means you are going to spend the better part of a day to get everything perfect - or at least perfect for now.  Time will tell.  In comparison to my Samsung UN65JU7100FXZA, which is now about 3yrs old, the Samsung has a better picture right out of the box and no matter how hard you try, you cannot get the TCL to look as good.  It is worth noting that the 3yr old Samsung still costs twice as much new if you can find it.  Overall, you can't beat the value of the TCL 517.  I paid with my Amazon Prime Visa, which got me 5% back and the 4yr warranty was under $25.  I don't normally buy extended warranties, but for $25, why not.

Product: TCL 55S517 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Sueann
review_detail.title: Lightweight
review_detail.content: Very lightweight. We are using for our 10 year old 's room. It's easy moved. Although it isnt 1080p He is still able to enjoy playing PS4 and xbox without any compliants.

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: J Maderious
review_detail.title: Came quickly and seems to be a good product. The only strange thing is that they ...
review_detail.content: Came quickly and seems to be a good product.  The only strange thing is that they sent a screwdriver with the tv to put the mounts on but no screws for the back of the tv to mount it to the wall.  Seems like every house in the country probably has a screwdriver..  Might be cheaper and more useful to send the screws that fit the tv..

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: I ascertained that the issue must be with the cable connector on the set itself as my original TV still works fine and the picture through HDMI is fine
review_detail.content: Black Friday bargain...not. I returned the first TV sent as I could not remove the constant static line on the left and top of picture when watching cable. The replacement set would not pick up any signal at all from my cable box. I ascertained that the issue must be with the cable connector on the set itself as my original TV still works fine and the picture through HDMI is fine. The Sceptre cable connection plugs in from the side as opposed from the bottom of the set. This design put pressure on the cable connection so the signal is compromised and/or completely eliminated. At least I learned something...get a TV with a proper configuration and avoid the cut rate brands.

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: cervezagut
review_detail.title: Great....but........
review_detail.content: Very good buy.  Fast shipping from seller.  Great picture quality, easy set-up.  I didn't give it 4 stars because of the sound.  Sound is "tinny".  Had to return - sound is awful.....

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Joshua Cisneros
review_detail.title: Great bargain!
review_detail.content: Works great, great price for such a large TV. The picture quality and sound quality are surprisingly good too considering the price. The TV came with a free screwdriver for installing the stand. The cable is kind of short, but that's not a huge problem. My only complaint would be the packaging. It was difficult to unbox everything.

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Tikigirl
review_detail.title: GREAT TV for the price!
review_detail.content: TV was delivered the next day!  Set up was easy...really appreciated that Sceptre thoughtfully included a small screwdriver in the packet to attach the stand legs (saved me an hour of searching for mine!). Picture is great, sound is more than sufficient for a bedroom.  Just one day in, but so far very happy!

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Rob
review_detail.title: Speakers are terrible -sound completely muffled when the vol is raised
review_detail.content: Love everything about this but the sound.  True, you get what you pay for.  I turned up the volume because a roommate was using a blender.  With other TVs i've owned i can hear the audio distinctly which increasing the sound.  This TV, the speakers sound muffled if i increase passed 8 (and that's 8 out of 100 on the volume meter).  If you buy, you'll have to spend what you're saving and get some decent speakers.  I'd return if i didn't already mount it.

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Michelle
review_detail.title: Good investment, amazing price
review_detail.content: Good picture, don't expect real to life pictures. This isn't a 4k TV, and it's not a 1080p either. Despite that, the clarity on the TV is really good if you take the time to fiddle with the settings when setting it up. Lastly, who needs a smart TV when you can hook an Amazon Firestick up to this and get all the same features and functionality of a smart tv?

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: E. Earnhart
review_detail.title: WRONG VESA Mounting Hole Pattern in Sceptre documents.  Pattern is actually 100 x 200.
review_detail.content: The VESA mounting hole pattern is incorrect in the Sceptre documentation and the Amazon product page.  The actual pattern on the product is 100 x 200 (not 100 x 100).  Now I have to buy an adapter.

Product: Sceptre X328BV-SR 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: C
review_detail.title: Works perfectly
review_detail.content: These are really a great value for the price here. We liked this so much, we ordered 2 more for the rest of the house!

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.author: Fred Holford
review_detail.title: easy to use
review_detail.content: only been using a week, still finding new features, so far so good.

review_detail.title: Love it
review_detail.content: You can't beat Samsung quality this is a great TV and I love it

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.title: Box damaged
review_detail.content: The box that it came in was open from the bottom when I received it.

review_detail.content: Great picture and easy setup

review_detail.content: great product

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.title: External speaker system recommended.  ;-)
review_detail.content: It's a perfect size (43") for "our" bed room; not too big, not too small.  We do recommend to use your favorite external speaker system IF you want a better sound.

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.author: Della
review_detail.title: Five Stars
review_detail.content: Picture is absolutely brilliant.

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.title: I am amazed at the picture clarity
review_detail.content: I am amazed at the picture clarity,and the sound is really good. One of the best things is how EASY it was to set up! All we had to do was screw on the legs and plug it in. Then just follow the on-screen prompts to set up with Samsung. We watched a movie the same evening we set it up. Additionally, It stands up off the table it's on so it's easy to dust under. If I had room, I'd buy another!

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

review_detail.author: Andre
review_detail.title: good product
review_detail.content: good product

Product: Samsung 40NU7100 Flat 40” 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Andrew C.
review_detail.title: I lost the panel lottery, or they're all this bad and no one notices
review_detail.content: I've done a fair amount of research, waiting, and second-guessing myself on the 55R617 before deciding to finally jump on it during last week's sale. I really, really wanted this to work out, but it just wasn't my lucky day.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: Best TV I've ever had
review_detail.content: I have never owned a TCL before and was hesitant to stray from the usual name brands but this TV is more than worth the price. If this is what TCL is producing, then I'll be sticking with TCL from now on. There are only two issues I have with the picture quality and that is the banding that results from the back lighting, and a halo effect that is produced under certain conditions, from the local dimming. But, for the price, these are very minor complaints and are outweighed by the sheer quality of this thing. The feet are solid and made of metal and the case is metal and has a great finish. The picture this TV produces is incredible and as close to OLED as I've seen from a non-OLED set. It is more than bright enough for any environment, has incredible color, and great local dimming. Very pleased and would strongly recommend to anyone.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Dedicated Follower of Ray
review_detail.title: Excellent value, love the Roku operating system.
review_detail.content: I was contemplating an LG OLED but couldn't justify the price.  I read a lot about the quality control issues of this model and I seem to have lucked out with a good panel.  Coming from a 10 year-old 46" Panasonic plasma, I'm blown away by the immersive feel and amazing picture of this TCL.  I also love the Roku operating system, which is simple and logical.  I've had a Roku device for a long time, so I was right at home.  I also like the small Roku remote, which I prefer to the "spaceship" remotes of other brands.  Set up was simple.  I honestly believe is Apple made a TV, it would be like this TCL.  Simple, intuitive, and everything you need and nothing you don't.  My only beef is that there are only three HDMI inputs, but I knew that going in.  That said, the built-in Roku means I don't have to use an HDMI to hook up a Roku box, so that sort of makes up for it.  Maybe TCL has improved their quality control, but so far I am satisfied.  Beware that if you buy this TV at Best Buy, you get an inferior remote that does not work with voice commands.  The version of the TV sold by Amazon comes with the superior remote.  Delivery was professional and as promised, and I was even able to move it up a few days after I originally scheduled it.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: John C
review_detail.title: Great TV, unbeatable price.
review_detail.content: Great TV, unbeatable price.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: justmytwocents
review_detail.title: Possible Vizio killer?  TCL with Roku is almost perfect
review_detail.content: Since we ditched the satellite, almost all TV we watch is using a Roku.  So, when the bedroom TV gave up the ghost, we thought this was a natural choice.  It was a little pricey, but has the 4K HDR, and we already new we would appreciate that, having a Vizio in the living room with the same features.  The Vizio gives us problems showing the HDR from the Roku, but having Roku integrated into this TCL means there are no problems at all.  Much prefer it to the Smartcast feature in the Vizio.  One little thing bugs me about this TV.  Plugging anything into the headphone jack mutes the sound, even if there is no headphone attached.  Other TVs only mute if there is a headphone to complete the circuit.  This means I can't use my wireless headphones, because when the base station is plugged in, the TV mutes itself.  Most other TVs you can leave the base station plugged in, and the TV only mutes when the headphones are in use.  Yes, I can use headphones plugged into the remote or into my smart phone with the app, but the sound quality is terrible compared to the sound I get with the Sennheiser wireless headphones.  I should also mention that the carton the TV came in was in rough shape, as others have mentioned, but luckily the TV itself is fine, having survived the trip with nary a scratch.  Overall, this TV is an excellent value at this price, and it is hard to imagine anyone being unhappy with it as long as it is working and is reliable long-term.  So, unless or until it breaks, it gets five stars.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Gerardo Chavez
review_detail.title: Great TV!
review_detail.content: This is the biggest bang for your buck. This tv has all the features I need and at a great price. I understand that people are getting defective products like I did last year with TCL P6, so I was worried how this one was going to turn out. Amazon gives you like month to return it (better than bestbuy 14day). For me, this tv turned out great and I prefer gaming on it than on my LG C17 OLED.  P.S. cable/satellite always sucks on 4K displays.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Eric
review_detail.title: This is an amazing TV, especially for the price
review_detail.content: This is an amazing TV, especially for the price, and I couldn't be happier with it. I also own a LG 55 B6P OLED which cost me $2,000, and the picture quality between this TV and that one honestly doesn't justify the price disparity unless you're an enthusiast and REALLY picky. The amount of features TCL packed into this TV for the price is nothing short of impressive. I've not noticed any defects or quality control issues on my set, but other reviewers have, so I recommend paying very close attention the first few days to check for any manufacturers' defects. There were no dead pixels or banding issues on my screen. The only negative aspect of the TV which I noticed is the screen uniformity. When you display a solid color image you notice that the corners are slightly dimmer than the center of the screen. This is not noticeable under normal viewing conditions but it is noticeable if you run a screen test that displays solid colors, which I recommend everyone does. The good things about this TV far outweigh the bad, and you can't expect perfection at this price range. I think any casual viewer, Netflix user, Youtube watcher and/or console gamer will be very pleased with this TV. TCL did an amazing job and deserve praise for this model.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

Product: LG Electronics 55UK6300PUE 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Joseph M.
review_detail.title: I've bought Sony, and Samsung, and Vizio, all were very good, and the LG is joining them.
review_detail.content: The LG replaced one of the best TV's I ever had. I had a 15 year old Samsung DLP, but not just a DLP, it was the best DLP ever made. No light bulbs, no spinning mirrors, no moving parts. After 12 or 13 years, it started getting white spots, so I  replaced the DLP chip myself and it was great again until the remote, and switches would not respond, So in comes the 65" LG, this is the biggest I've bought so far, the others were 62", and a little smaller. This one is big in the bedroom, it's like being at a drive-in. The color is good, nothing blares out to me in the picture that I could complain about. I should tell you that I know  what a good picture should look like, and there are a lot of bad TV out there. The LG has a setup that it takes you through to set it up, that was OK.  I got rid of DirecTV, and use DirecTVNow through a 4k FireTV box, and it works really well, and cut my TV bill by 75% . You do have to have Internet to get DirecTVNow, it is a streaming service, but it works really well for me. They gave me 125 channels, and HBO for $55 a month, plus I can record.  It's all new, and so far, so good. The LG looked really good on my FireTV, and  DirecTVNow, which is an app on the FireTV.  I did buy a sound bar with a floor standing woofer, but to be honest, the LG was the first really flat Tv to have decent sound. The sound bar and woofer were a bit better, but not so much that I would cry if I didn't have it. It was a Vizio soundbar I bought in a local club store. The TV box came double boxed by Fedex, and the Fedex guy brought it inside, but wanted to leave it outside and make me bring it in. The TV is light, and you have to put legs on it. each leg takes three screws, and they are labeled A and B, so pay attention, or the Tv might be tipsy on you if you put them on backwards.  This TV was bought with a 4 year warranty, yes, it cost a little more, but read the details,  they fix it in your home, and if they can't fix it they refund your money, how can you beat that. I keep all my electronics on a UPS  battery backup. I live in the lightning belt, and lightening will kill a TV, and many other electronics things very easily. Worse than that, it can cause a hard to find problem, one that many TV repair shops might have trouble fixing. It can even cause multiple problems, making it even harder to fix. I have been on UPS battery backup for 20 years, and yes , I have to replace batteries, and and in some cases I had to replace the UPS, that is way better than having all sorts of problems with my TV's, and other electronics stuff. This LG Tv is a bargain, it is a 2018 model, and supports Google Home, and Amazon Alesis . It has bluetooth to connect to a  bluetooth sound bar.. So let me share my experience in the local club store when I bought the sound bar.  I asked if any of them come with wire connections to the TV , as well as Bluetooth.  I worked in electronics my whole life, and I would rather use wire. In any case, he said no, they all use bluetooth, no wire. So I get it home and open the box and there is an optical cable, a 3,5mm cable, and one other cable, so there was 4 ways to connect that sound bar to my TV, not just Bluetooth. So  I used the Toslink optical cable to connect the sound bar, but now, about the TV and the sound bar. I had the center channel working on the optical cable, and before that I had it on the 3.5mm wire to my cell phone to hear what it sounded like. When the TV came on it dropped the woofer, which does connect with Bluetooth to the sound bar.  So I turned the TV off, and back on, and that was all it needed,  all the sound came on as it should. No hassle, it just did its thing and worked. Their are a lot of apps in this TV, so if you are not fortunate enough to have FireTv with a Prime account, which is awesome, and I highly recommend it, the Tv has a lot of other streaming services built into it.  One of them is Amazon, but that way of getting Amazon content, in no way compares to FireTV, but there are many other apps also.. You can also plus a USB thumb drive , or maybe even a usb hard drive into the back of the TV and watch video, pictures and music from it, It works really well. Then there are plenty of HDMI connectors, although I only needed one.  The remote does leave a little room to complain, the buttons could have been bigger, especially the ones you would use in the dark. Ok, I can replace the remote with a programmable touch screen, but why should i need to do that? Are you reading this LG, get with it , make a great remote for this great TV.  You should be able to get 12 to 14, or more feet from a screen this big,  Some people get lemons, some people don't know what a good picture is, and some people just like to complain, try to know the difference when you read reviews.

There are other brands that cost less than this one, but I decided to stick with a brand I like a lot, and I'm happy I did. I was a little concerned about setting it up with the TV provider when have, but that was NOT a problem. This is the first smart TV I've owned, and now I know why they're called 'smart'. It practically sets itself up! The default setting has a VERY annoying female voice that guides you through all the set-up. It wouldn't be so bad other than for the fact that she talks so fast you can barely understand her. It's easy to disable that in settings. I like every feature of this TV and highly recommend it if you're in the market for a smart TV. The price is hard to believe for what you get. The quality of the picture if great and the sound quality is also good. So far I've found nothing to complain about with this TV.

review_detail.title: For the Prime Day Deal, this really was a steal!
review_detail.content: I've used Fire TV Sticks and the Fire TV before it was the silly pendant thing you can buy nowadays. Thought they were great devices, but had an interest in replacing a TV and figured "why not have it integrated?" It was between the Roku-powered TCL 5-series that never made it down to a price point I had to buy, and then came the Prime Day deal on the 43". I was replacing a Samsung 40" LCD that's 10+ years old, so ironically the footprint of the 43" was slightly smaller. Picture quality is plenty fine and the app integration is nice. I was pleasantly surprised with the integration of the TV antenna and HDMI inputs, very smooth and I like the instant preview of the tuner in the interface without having to truly switch to it.

Even if you aren’t as tech-savvy as me, the voice remote can help you navigate between the apps on the tv with relative ease. I’ve seen TVs in Walmart this size that cost more than this one and I don’t see the difference. This one looks just as good to me, especially since I was upgrading from a 26 inch LCD that was about 9 years old. What a night and day difference, wow.

Huge fan of FireTV. The 4K image is stunning, especially for movies from Amazon and Netflix. The TV doesn't ship with the silly frame interpolation that many do, making 24 fps movies look like soap operas, and it doesn't default to super color saturation, either. Least amount of adjustment I've had to do on a new TV.

I would have gone with more sophisticated (and expensive) Samsung for things like live TV and gaming but this one is king for your streaming needs.

review_detail.author: G. Hill
review_detail.title: Can't wait to replace this one
review_detail.content: PRO: The picture is very good. The Black Friday price and the delivery were great. Roku is the number one streaming device for good reason. It has all the cool stuff I loved about my Roku stick. The purchase of a TV integrated with Roku seemed like a good idea at the time, however…

Product: TCL 43S305 43-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Bonbon
review_detail.title: Hello TCL!
review_detail.content: This is my first Smart TV. Let me tell you, I am impressed. It connects to internet even with the weakest signal. You can install an app on your smartphone and use smartphone as your remote. Picture quality is great on all free and paid online services. I tried YouTube without creating an account and quality is not acceptable. I guess creating an account would let me pick quality. Or maybe watching through the web browser installed on TV? It is my first month with this Smart TV and I feel I should have bought it earlier. Never had TCL products before. Always been a huge Sony fan, but guess what, this TV is as good as Sony TV I was checking at the store. Overall, I am enjoying every minute of watching this TV. We will see how long it will last.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.content: Using this in my bedroom, one wire—-just the power cord. Nice !

review_detail.author: On-Awa S.
review_detail.title: Great price
review_detail.content: The thing I liked least was not allot of detection and how to videos, however I love all the options and things that can be done with tv. Great picture and system once it is all figured out 100% happy.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.title: Five Stars
review_detail.content: The tv looks so nice in my house. Great price. Came on time too.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.author: Frank A. Petillo, Sr.
review_detail.title: TCL TV wireless DOA
review_detail.content: Unfortunately I went through the trouble of installing it into the wall and then going through the install screens when I found that the wireless portion of the TV was not functioning.  Called TCL tech support and they agreed that I should get it replaced sure to the wireless failure.  So basically DOA.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.title: Love it love it love it
review_detail.content: I just love my TV the only drawback is its not voice controlled so I have to keep up with the remote oh well it is really a good.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.author: WILLIAM PERKINS
review_detail.title: Not sure why this was so inexpensive?
review_detail.content: This thing is awesome, I have 5 TVs in my house this is by far the easiest to hook up and best picture. The reviews I read where correct the speakers are amazing this is a great TV if you want to have one to take outside just need to plug it in hook it up to Wi-Fi and watch the game on the patio.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.author: Bill R
review_detail.title: Don't Buy!
review_detail.content: Came in the box with a cracked screen held together at the top with packing tape.  No remote, no stand and no power cord. I'm waiting for a replacement and will amend this if the replacement is in better shape.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.author: eopage18
review_detail.title: Nice TV been using as a computer monitor and the ...
review_detail.content: Nice TV been using as a computer monitor and the resolution is par for what I am using it for but it is very lightweight compared to others and having the Roku built in is wonderful since I use the Plex app quiet often

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (Certified Refurbished)

review_detail.author: Karyn Kuhl
review_detail.title: Great picture!
review_detail.content: Very pleased with purchase. Just the right size, works great!

review_detail.content: had to be returned because of damage but great tv

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Daniel.Y
review_detail.title: Never buy this product.
review_detail.content: I am changing my rate from 5 stars to 1 star. Its been just a month since I purchased this item. It is now keep rebooting so I had to plug the power off. When I switch it on, it infinitely reboots itself. Boots --> Freeze --> Reboot --> Freeze --> Reboot. Terrible.

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Big Dog
review_detail.title: I have several smart LG TVs and a Vizio
review_detail.content: I have several smart LG TVs and a Vizio. They are all great. However this is the best TV I have ever owned. I purchased it for a room that did not have a tv and took a chance. Easy to set up, great picture and sound. For the price it cannot be beat.

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Chester Allen
review_detail.title: One Star
review_detail.content: Two months and it is toast.  Not able to detect Wifi

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Samantha Rummel
review_detail.title: Excellent little TV!!
review_detail.content: This is actually a great little TV! I had a bit of an issue setting it up because my internet provider was the issue, but I contacted the customer service number on the box and they were FABULOUS... this TV will let you (very easily) set up your directv, cable boxes, DVD players, and has a button for Amazon, Netflix, sets up your Hulu... The volume is very sufficient... It's just a great TV for your bedroom, guest room, kid's room... And the price is terrific... I'll definitely purchase another one for my guest room.

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Sharon Stillson
review_detail.title: Wasted money
review_detail.content: I bought this to replace a Samsung Smart TV. I had the Samsung for several years it worked wonderfully and I planned on purchasing another. Then when I read some of the reviews for the TLC especially in light of the price, I decided to try it. From day one it was a disappointment. The ad says easy to use remote. That's a joke. What about this remote is easy? First it's so limited it doesn't even have a control for volume. I end up switching back and forth between several remotes. Yes the app is an interesting but only when it works.

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: great connectivity, image quality
review_detail.content: Just make sure you know what you are buying this TV for. If streaming is your thing, look no further. This set is relatively basic but everything is there: great connectivity, image quality, decent sound, comfortable controls, lightweight. My only regrets? I should have spent a bit more to get 4k instead of 1080P and maybe bigger size. It is surprisingly lightweight, modern looking and relatively slim. I would have gone with more sophisticated (and expensive) Samsung for things like live TV and gaming but this one is king for your streaming needs.

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: M. Gibbs
review_detail.title: TV and Computer Monitor - works well for both uses!
review_detail.content: My main purpose in buying this TV was to use as a large computer monitor when I'm working on these massive spreadsheets and powerpoint presentations that are my world.  The second use was as an actual TV.

Product: TCL 40S305 40-Inch 1080p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: worked out well for me
review_detail.content: when my mom's complex upgraded there in house TV antenna system Suddenly she needed a digital TV. This  TCL 32S305 32-Inch unit  seemed to fit the bill nicely and the price was very right. The Rocu remote was pretty "old lady friendly" (not to many buttons) but I expect her to get lost in the endless menus, However finding the antenna is not hard and when u turn off  when set to TV/antenna it restarts on TV.
