Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: J.Frazier
review_detail.title: TCL - Best bang for your buck
review_detail.content: I've never heard of TCL before I purchased this TV, when I asked people I knew who were TV fanatics they all seemed fair to midland on the quality.  I needed a new bedroom TV that had smart functions such as hulu and Netflix, and Playstation Vue, so having roku built in was going to be very convenient.  The setup was easy, just attach the legs to the bottom of the TV with 2 screws each.  It is a bit wobbly if pushed, but it seems sturdy enough.  Setting up the TV itself was fast, it does ask you to connect or setup your Roku account, which took just a few mins.  It will even ask you to plug in your existing equipment (cable box, game systems, amazon fire tv, etc) into the HDMI ports and allow you to tell it what each hdmi port has connected.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: JustaDude
review_detail.title: Nice TV for the $
review_detail.content: Was hesitant to buy a not so known brand. However for the most part its a really good TV.  Did some research on TCL and found out that several tv brands were in fact manufactered by TCL. Emerson, RCA, Phillips etc.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: Don't waste your time in a few months you'll wish you didn't buy this brand!
review_detail.content: It was great when we first got it but in recent months some of the apps don't load or the force close the tv constantly kicks you out of cable or other input including all apps. Worst TV ever! I bought the protection plan through Amazon and submitted a claim and they told me to contact the manufacturer. GO WITH NAME BRANDS and stick to what you know!

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Ben Foley
review_detail.title: Great tv for the price point. Works well in bright room.
review_detail.content: So far, so good. Have had it up and running for a day now. Good screen clarity, nice picture, speakers work perfect for my living room/kitchen. Have been watching football all day and it's been a pleasure. Played FIFA on my PS4 earlier in the day and it looked and performed great.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Sami N
review_detail.title: Wonderful TV!
review_detail.content: This is a wonderful TV. The first one that came had a cracked screen and Amazon replaced it immediately! (thanks!). This TV (55") is really huge and the picture quality in my honest opinion is very clear. Please note if you use cable, I noticed yesterday when trying the cable channels, almost all the channels are HD 1080. So you may not see any difference in the picture quality (except that the screen might be much larger) in the cable channels (e.g., CNNHD). But, there are many movies and also Youtube clips that are in 4K and you can really enjoy them. What I noticed is that even 1080 provides a good quality for my eyes. I could hardly notice if a picture is 1080 or 4K, but I can tell you the 4K quality seemed just to be very real. Given the largeness of the screen, you could think you were there in person (something you can't possibly feel with 1080). The Ruko environment is wonderfully easy (I already had a Roku account from the past). For its price, I think this TV is a bargain. Overall, my previous TV (LG 42" 3D HD) was already really good so I was in doubt whether paying an extra $400+ (price and tax) would justify, but now I can see it was worth. It's like having a small-scale movie theatre in your home. Lastly, I read among the reviews (before buying the TV) that some people had complained about the TV's speaker (so I had thought I needed also to buy a separate speaker!). Honestly, I find the speakers really awesome! I don't know what these other reviewers are talking about. I agree it is not the best speaker you may see, but I find the sound quality and volume to be really good (note: I am only an ordinary use, not a tech savvy who can distinguish microscopic differences). Overall, if you are looking for a 4K TV and not very expensive, I strongly recommend that look at this TV very closely before considering anything else. I have found it a really good TV.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Coney
review_detail.title: we love this Smart TV
review_detail.content: we love this Smart TV!!!

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: R. Brooding
review_detail.title: Pro Tip: Get the Insurance
review_detail.content: We ordered this television and got it at a great price. When we received it, the interface (Roku) was user friendly as was the remote (the kids loved it). The picture quality was not as nice as we initially hoped (watched Moana in HD) but between the user-friendly UI, the decent quality picture and great price, we decided to keep it. Over two weeks of use, we had 3-4 complete television freezes, resulting in several resets. Again, no big deal. What ruined this television for us was the loud pop from the television one day, seems like it broke and would not come on. We contacted Amazon and ended up returning the television, electing to go with another brand. It's a shame, we wanted to like the TV but it just did not work for us. We also recognize this can happen to any electronic device.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Darcie Mullins
review_detail.title: ***Update*** I've had for 6 months now...
review_detail.content: ***Update*** - It's now been 6 months, and the TV will no longer turn on!  Contacting and going through their Warranty procedure is an absolute nightmare!  Once you call, and they do nothing but make you unplug your TV, and try to reset it, you email them your life history, and get an automated response of - 1-2 business day response time.  Well, it's now been over a week with no response, and still a broken TV that just has a blue screen when turned on. When I sent a follow up email they said they still didn't have enough information, but no one of course told me this upfront (again, they want your blood in writing). So, I get another automated response today of - 1-2 day response time.  You get what you pay for - 6 months of an amazing TV (seriously loved it), and then nothing!  Warranty through them is useless, and they are less than helpful.  Over a week with no TV/Cable now - it's irritating when you want to watch a movie or news, but can't!

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Wells Turnage
review_detail.title: Great value
review_detail.content: Great value for the price.  Built in tuner works well and the guide for the OTA tv is fantastic.  Smart interface is not quite intuitive but quick to respond.  Initial setup is a PIA to set up / create accounts which you have to do to make everything work.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Steven G.
review_detail.title: Awesome entry level 4K TV
review_detail.content: This is my first 4K TV and I gotta say having the built in Roku is pretty awesome!  I am a big believer in IP TV so this seamlessly worked with Netflix (to get 4K from Netflix you need to pay an extra $2.00 a month), Hulu, HBO Now, and Amazon Video.  I haven't tried Crunchyroll yet to see how that experience is.  The built in speakers are just okay, so I bought a

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Gbear LaGorilla
review_detail.title: holy crap what an awesome tv
review_detail.content: Here are my small frustrations so far, most of which are not the tv's fault. The mount was delivered a few hours before the TV. I got to work and put the mount up on the wall. I made my best guesses but I guessed wrong. The mount holes on the tv are not in the center, they are on the bottom! So there ya go, now you know if the same thing happens to you, mount about 8 inches lower (if you got the 55).

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Stuart I. Rice
review_detail.title: My parents love this, and it makes me incredibly jealous!
review_detail.content: I bought this TV for my parents, they were still on an old 55" CRT projection. This sounded like a good deal. Wow, what an understatement. I didn't realize that it was HDR & 4K! The picture is outstanding and the menu system is really snappy. This eliminated so many wires and remotes for my parents, I now have a pile of electronics I'm not sure what I'm going to do with. My parents are 88 & 80... and they have no problem operating and using the television which is about the biggest endorsement I can give anything!

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)
TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Squidney
review_detail.title: A great entry-level/budget 4K/HDR product
review_detail.content: I purchased this TV to go into a spare bedroom that's primarily used for gaming & sports, so it would not only need to be a fantastic TV, but also double as a 4th PC monitor.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Scott M. E
review_detail.title: Please Read - Detailed Summary for the "worried user"
review_detail.content: I spent close 20 hours of research on TV's (sadly not kidding). Through my research I learned about all the new specs and what specs make a good TV like: LED, 4K, HDR, WCG, 120 hrtz etc. besides WCG, this TV has them all for at affordable price, NOTHING comes close. People are so caught up on 4K.. HDR (High Dynamic Range) make a better difference to the eye than 4K (Google it). Now there are two types of HDR, some have both but this one has HDR10 which is the endustry standard (Dolby Vision HDR is better but not as popular and barely can tell a difference). Let me say I was so worried that this TV would ship and I would be upset. This was not the case... the TV comes with Roku (a value in itself) and a very user friendly remote. Some people complain about the viewing angles and sound but to be honest - I really don't think it's bad, like at all (obviously not the best). Not enough to really complain. When I tested an HDR video on the YouTube app (search hdr) I was amazed. The blacks are so rich.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Reviewing Parent
review_detail.title: I like the concept but
review_detail.content: On the fence about this TV. Bought, set it up easily and seemed to work well.  I like that it had all the roku options and I only needed one remote for everything. Image is sometimes dark around the perimeter but considering the cost I was overall pleased until I wasn't. We were watching tv and all of a sudden it restarts itself but that's not the worst part. After doing that it a crackling noise started to come from the back of the TV. To me I associate the sound it was making with something that is about to catch fire electronically. So I quickly unplugged it, cleared everything away and got a fire extinguisher. Gave it some time, turned it back on and it made the noise again, figured I'd unplug and leave it off for a while. I'm not comfortable using it or leaving it plugged in when not in the house,the few times I have used it, the noise did not return but I don't want to take the risk.  I had posted a question asking if anyone else had had this issue but no one else has. TCL's customer service did respond to me and advised me to send an email referencing the question etc,  I did send an email as soon as I had all the information I thought they would want and included the amazon order. I have not heard back from them so since my time is running out (30 day return policy) I am probably going to return it to be on the safe side and get something a little more expensive but hopefully without this possible danger.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: John Ryan
review_detail.title: This is a great TV for the price
review_detail.content: Love it!  It's easy to switch between cable, antenna, Blue Ray player, and Roku streaming apps.  This has a much better picture than I expected after reading some of the reviews. The 4K picture is amazing but there is not a lot of 4K content out there yet (add the Roku 4K channel to see for yourself).  This displays regular HD content just fine.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Johnny
review_detail.title: good budget tv
review_detail.content: This is a good budget TV.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: P. R.
review_detail.title: HONEST REVIEW
review_detail.content: When I turned the tv on for the first time, the remote did not work. The tv was stock on the "Lets get started" page. I called customer support and after 45 minutes of trouble shooting they finally agreed to send me a new remote. I ended up smacking the remote a couple times and it started to work. So no more issues.

Product: TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: B. S.
review_detail.title: Great at this price-point, but watch for dead pixels.
review_detail.content: Upscales beautifully, and 4K may not be the revelation that 1080p was, but it's tripping my trigger. This TV is fantastic, I use it as a PC monitor and the menu is fast and snappy. I do wish it allowed for more granular control over your sound options, but turning off the frame engine was a breeze in game mode. The delay seems to be as advertised, not top-tier CS:GO good, but fine enough for fighting games online which have they're own amount of ms delay. I have the 49-inch version and it's almost too much display, almost. I couldn't justify my preferred 43in size with only a 10 dollar difference. Took stars off for the 3 small clusters of dead pixels(thought there was more, but that was lint), but at I hadn't even noticed until I was on this white page to write the review.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: "You buy cheap, you buy twice"
review_detail.content: The manufacturer sent a defective product that had outdated software and therefore was not able to connect to the internet and be set up. The manufacturer refused to take ownership or even offer any discount for the inconvenience. Huge lack of support by TCL.

review_detail.author: Donna Gall
review_detail.title: Made a great wedding anniversary present for my parents.  They love their new Smart TV!
review_detail.content: My parents wanted a new 32inch TV and since it was their wedding anniversary, we purchased this item for them.  They are more than happy with it and it has exceeded their expectations of a TV.  This is actually their first Smart TV and they are enjoying all of the great features it offers. They love to watch movies so, we purchased them a Netflix subscription and now they get to watch their movies in Style.  It has been easy for them to switch back and forth between cable and then to the Smart TV.  My mom loves watching YouTube videos and now she gets to enjoy it on this TV instead of her computer.  Best Anniversary gift ever!

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: GTX USER
review_detail.title: Very happy with this purchase!
review_detail.content: This was the first new TV I ever bought. Up until now, it has been hand-me-downs and used TVs for cheap. I was extremely dismayed when the first unit I received was broken. However the return and replacement process was easy, free and only took 2 days before the replacement arrived. It was shipped in the original box which is very well packaged, so I think the first TV was just a fluke. It is a brightly colored TV box though, so the delivery person will probably not leave it at your door. I had to be present for UPS to drop off. But they didn't make me sign anything, so it might be hit or miss in your area. Keep that in mind when ordering.

Product: TCL 32S305 32-Inch 720p Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Keith B.
review_detail.title: So Far So Good 👍
review_detail.content: Well, it has been running six plus hours a day 4 - 5 nights a week for a while now and although I know other buyers have had issues this TV has been great. Out of the box it was four screws to put on the two reasonably sturdy feet. Connectors for power and HDMI were easily accessible. Setup was confusing at first. This is supposed to primarily be a Roku/streaming TV although it can work just fine with you cable or satellite provider's set top box. Included instructions didn't have a bypass the online setup section but TCL support quickly walked me through getting the TV connected to the cable box. Image quality is stunning. I was honestly amazed at how bright, vibrant and saturated the picture is. Sound quality is good, nothing spectacular but it does go loud which was a necessity as my mother, the primary user, is going deaf and at full volume couldn't hear her previous TV. She hears this set perfectly and there's plenty of volume left if her hearing issues worsen. I would recommend this set to anyone looking for an affordable TV.

review_detail.author: Amazon shopper
review_detail.title: Got this to use Netflix.. Netflix crashes repeatedly.
review_detail.content: I'm incredibly frustrated with this product. I don't have cable so I got this to use streaming channels like Netflix, but the Netflix app on the Roku is so ridiculously glitchy it's not even worth having the TV anymore. Every 5-10 minutes, the app crashes and reverts to the home screen. It is not a problem with Netflix as it's working fine on my phone and laptop. I did some research and found that many other people have been having the exact same issue. I never leave negative reviews but this is egregious. Fix your system with an update that addresses this problem and I will update my rating accordingly.

review_detail.title: This is the best tv I've ever owned
review_detail.content: This is the best tv I've ever owned. There is so much you can do with it and I learn more about it every day! Not only does it offer the roku channels but there are also private channels you can add as well. I can connect my phone and stream pictures and videos, choose my own theme, my own screensaver. Not only does it offer channels but also games and other sources of entertainment. It has the best parental controls on it, too. I downloaded the roku app and can control my TV right from my phone and i love that! I just wish I would have bought a bigger size!

review_detail.author: corinne coker
review_detail.title: Terrible quality, do not buy!
review_detail.content: Do not buy this TV! We bought this TV on Prime Day and we’re excited to upgrade our bedroom tv. It is a piece of crap!! The TV picture turns off and goes to only audio when you change the channel.  You have to unplug  the TV to get the picture back on. The sound quality is also poor. We are in the process of returning this

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: jamie
review_detail.title: Doesn't stay connected to the internet
review_detail.content: At first, the TV worked great; easy to navigate, great picture.  After 4 days, it wouldn't stay connected to the internet which left me with no access to the homepage or any apps. Then, one day, it started randomly working again. But only for about a week. It is now down, yet again. I have contacted Amazon, Best Buy, and Toshiba. No luck. The issue is NOT the internet because every other device in the house is fully connected without issues. At this point, I need to just buy a different TV all together. I will not be purchasing another Tobisha Amazon Fire TV. I would think twice about purchasing this.

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: Gary F
review_detail.title: Great tv
review_detail.content: This Tv is awesome. Very simple design with fire tv built in. Great picture at a great price. If you like the fire tv you will like this tv.

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: Jessica Litwin
review_detail.title: Good price, surprising sound quality
review_detail.content: Update 8-13 Today, there's an ad for Biore pore strip on the home page. Nowhere was it disclosed that this TV came "with ads." I'm very disappointed. On the other hand the TV is still working very well.

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: Muriel Dr. Mom
review_detail.title: Off to a great start
review_detail.content: I pre-ordered from Amazon.  I had been shopping for internet ready TVs in March and was about to hit 'buy' when I heard that Amazon and Best Buy were coming out with this.  I knew that if it had problems, Amazon would make it right.

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: sixerb
review_detail.title: Flickering issues 1st day & Amazon wouldn't replace it-Prime Day deal was too good apparently
review_detail.content: We bought this 50 inch TV on Prime Day.  The picture is a screen shot of a video I took and not very good representation.  Upon setting it up the TV had flickering lines and squares in random places on the screen.  This occurred no matter what app was being used.  I contacted Amazon, Best Buy, and Toshiba via phone to attempt to replace the TV with the same model.  Amazon stated that I could only return the TV.  Best Buy stated that they would replace it, but I had to go through Amazon, and Amazon refused to replace it.  I went to Best Buy locally, and they stated that they could not override Amazon's return policy for Prime Day electronics.  I contacted Toshiba to attempt to utilize the warranty, but they stated that since it was new they would not replace it and that I needed to return it to Amazon.  So I had to take it apart (no biggie) and place it back inside of the box.  Luckily I had the box and styrofoam inserts still.  Then I had to lug it to a UPS store to send it back to Amazon for a refund.  I will never buy electronics on Prime Day again.  The great price was the reason that Amazon and Best Buy stated that the TV would not be replaced.  Now I have to wait for either Labor Day sales or Black Friday sales to get a good deal on a TV locally.  Thanks a lot Amazon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: Elle
review_detail.title: Good picture--Sucky Remote
review_detail.content: The display is excellent. It's nice to have automatic buttons to reach streaming providers. The drawback? If you don't want Alexa invading your home and consequently do not use the voice activation portion of the appliance which is a forced item, there is no JUMP BUTTON on the remote to go between dual stations. That's a BIG drawback. One is forced to go to the menu each time or use the navigation button, another avenue for the menu. Sucks.

Product: Toshiba 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR - Fire TV Edition

review_detail.author: orbofshingeki
review_detail.title: One of the Best Tv's for the Money
review_detail.content: Now. let me start off with saying that i'm not an expert on TV's. My first HDTV was a Vizio 42 inch 1080p that i bought almost 5 years ago after high school. It looked great. I Paid $420 for it. I thought i got a pretty good deal on it. Fast forward to 2018 and 4k is still settling in and technology is moving forward. I was at work during Prime week and the website was terribly slow but i still wanted to see what they had in stock. I stumbled across this TV as i was going to be in the market for one during the holiday season 2018. When i found this TV, I was shocked at how much it was! $280! For a 50 inch 4k Fire TV with Alex built in, That's almost half the cost of my old vizio. I thought it was too good to be true. Reviews were mixed but i wanted to take a stab at it anyways. I ordered it and it was here 3 days later. My initial impressions were "eh". Setup was a breeze but there was more than that i had noticed. I decided on comparing it with my vizio with some Good Mythical Morning on YouTube. I Know it's compressed video but it was the best i had to work with at first. I watched one episode and I was kind of Disappointed. The Brightness was good but the color was kind of dull overall and over saturated on some parts of the image like a person's face, but i wasn't giving up there. Setting the TV's Picture color setting from default to natural completely changed the game. The Color was great! Everything seemed correct with pulling up a color correction test on YouTube and it looked great! The Speakers were OK but that doesn't bother me because i have a dedicated 5.1 Surround System that blows the socks on the TV speakers. I really wanted a bigger size TV overall since the 42 inch wasn't quite the size I wanted. The 50 Inch was the perfect size for my TV stand and it matched the room which is a pretty small living room but it worked just fine. Now it's $400 and i still think it's a good deal considering my 42 inch was $20 more. I run the TV 1080p still because my laptop does not output 4k but It still looks great. The Fire TV portion is good for what it offers. More Ad's than I liked but for the value, No big deal. The 4k Netflix Shows look great. HDR Looks really good. The only downside to this TV for me is when i'm playing Dolby Digital through any apps on the smart portion of the TV, the volume seems to fluctuate. I'm sure this can be fixed with a software update but It's what i experienced. I would give it a go if you're interested in getting a good TV for the Money and hey if It doesn't work out, 30 Day Return!

review_detail.title: Terrible TCL customer service!!
review_detail.content: I did a lot of research before buying this TV.  TCL has gotten a good reputation for having high quality at a low price.  I had bad banding on both sides of my screen when light colors were shown (see pic) so I contacted TCL’s customer service.  The girl on the phone told me that’s normal.  I wouldn’t accept that answer so she had me send some pictures and they would email me back.  I was shocked at the response (see email pic)!  The fact that their service department doesn’t see any defect is insulting to me.  After reading other Amazon reviews it seems like this is a serious issue for some but not all.  I liked everything about this TV and would love to get a replacement that doesn’t have this issue but I told them I would never buy one of their products again.  If they can’t admit to something so obvious why take the risk.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: JB
review_detail.title: Blown Away by the TCL 65" 6 Series TV
review_detail.content: I finally was able to get this TV a month after ordering it. Amazon delivery sent 2 movers who delivered it, unpacked it, attached the stand, plugged it up to make sure it worked and removed all the packaging. The TV is amazing in regards to the build quality, the ROKU operating system and the picture quality. The TV stand has the feet on the ends of the TV and just enough height, so it allowed me to place my JBL 3.1 soundbar directly underneath the TV for a clean finished look, while still having amazing sound. The remote is improved in its design and function. Amazon sells the premium version with the RF remote so you can point it anywhere and the TV will pick up the signal, unlike the BB version which comes with an IR remote and has to be pointed directly at the sensor on the TV or it won't work. The TCL remote is also slightly flatter and wider then previous TCL TV remotes and it fits in your hand better. They also made the play/pause button larger and with a slight indentation so you can work it in complete darkness simply by feel, which is great! Set up of the TV was a breeze with the ROKU operating system and basic picture adjustments are simple and straightforward using the TCL remote. You will need to download the ROKU app to make more intricate picture setting changes, but it too is very easy to use.

Product: TCL 55R617 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Amazon Customer
review_detail.title: The picture quality is amazing coming from a 10+ year old plasma
review_detail.content: Coming from a LG 42PC5D this is a massive upgrade. While I am not an expert, I have tested a couple games (Witcher 3 and Forza 7) and watched some video from various sources (Youtube, Amazon, and Netflix). The picture quality is amazing coming from a 10+ year old plasma. Input lag is low in game mode, but the picture quality is a bit worse (mainly black uniformity is not as good, while in non-game mode it seems to be nearly perfect). I was worried about black levels not being as good as a plasma tv or OLED, but that doubt quickly faded away. The blacks are extremely dark, colors are vibrant, and the image is especially crisp. From my limited time with the tv so far, I am blown away with the value you get here. I will update my review after I calibrate the tv (out of the box it looks stunning, so if you don't like to mess with settings to get a great picture look not further) and get to spend some more time with it.

review_detail.author: Robin Ray
review_detail.title: This TV Put A Smile On My Face
review_detail.content: A lot has been written about this TV already so I won't go into the specs but, instead, relate my experience with it. This TV rules. 4K videos look great on it. The audio is loud and rounded enough that I don't need a soundbar. As we speak I'm listening to the greatest hits of No Doubt on it. I spent a lot of time with the different video settings but, really, the default ones suit me fine. When I first turned this unit on the Smoothing effect was on high. I've since turned it off because even on low setting videos look like a soap opera. In my neck of the woods I don't get many over-the-air (OTA) channels and have to settle for just a handful of "old people" stations. The internet connection in my building is relatively weak; however, when it does work well, I can stream movies from VUDU in high definition without much interruptions. I plan to keep this piece of electronica around for a few years. I'd originally bought the 49" inch version but, because my vision is not the greatest in the world, returned it for this 55 incher. Amazon refunded my money for the 49" one rather quickly, too. All in all, one of the best purchases I've made in a long time.

review_detail.author: Scott Jansen
review_detail.title: Incredible Picture Quality and Ultra Thin Design
review_detail.content: Wow, we are blown away with this TV we purchased for our bedroom.  Great looking TV when it's off with a super thin/sleek profile.  I can't believe how thin they can make these things.  The picture quality is even more impressive.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Curt
review_detail.title: Excellent Value
review_detail.content: We bought this to replace an older 37in Samsung TV in our bedroom. The picture quality is really good and the TV is very responsive while using the apps. The  OTA TV guide is also really nice and responsive. Obviously, the picture is not as good as our Samsung 8 series 65in UHD in the living room, but for our bedroom this is the perfect TV! I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a new TV.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Sev S.
review_detail.title: Great price, great quality
review_detail.content: Pros:

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: indubitably
review_detail.title: Very responsive TV for gaming
review_detail.content: I got the 55" and I am very impressed with the TV so far. The most surprising thing has to be how low the response time is for gaming, it is significantly more responsive than any of my other TVs, even the small ones.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Robin Ray
review_detail.title: This TV Put A Smile On My Face
review_detail.content: A lot has been written about this TV already so I won't go into the specs but, instead, relate my experience with it. This TV rules. 4K videos look great on it. The audio is loud and rounded enough that I don't need a soundbar. As we speak I'm listening to the greatest hits of No Doubt on it. I spent a lot of time with the different video settings but, really, the default ones suit me fine. When I first turned this unit on the Smoothing effect was on high. I've since turned it off because even on low setting videos look like a soap opera. In my neck of the woods I don't get many over-the-air (OTA) channels and have to settle for just a handful of "old people" stations. The internet connection in my building is relatively weak; however, when it does work well, I can stream movies from VUDU in high definition without much interruptions. I plan to keep this piece of electronica around for a few years. I'd originally bought the 49" inch version but, because my vision is not the greatest in the world, returned it for this 55 incher. Amazon refunded my money for the 49" one rather quickly, too. All in all, one of the best purchases I've made in a long time.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: ABRAHAM D YANG
review_detail.title: Refresh rate CANNOT be turned off. Movies will look like soap opera.
review_detail.content: Let me save you some time and sanity: if you don’t like your movies to look like the news or soap opera, DO NOT BUY this TV. There is no setting for you to turn off the refresh rate. Other than that, there is serious edge light bleed. The picture quality is average. I mean, you get what you pay for, nothing more.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Erik Skywalker
review_detail.title: Awesome TV! But bad dirty screen effect.
review_detail.content: Overall I’m happy with this TV, the color is awesome!!! Especially with Dolby Vision on from Apple TV 4K, picture quality is awesome too when playing 4K movies, I watched several movies that I’ve watched before and then I watched them again in 4K on this TV and I noticed all the details that I’ve missed with 1080P TV. BUT, omg the dirty screen effect is overwhelming! And light leak is pretty bad too, but you won’t notice it unless when ur video is showing majorly white or black scenes.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: J&J
review_detail.title: Cord cutters, beware!
review_detail.content: We cut the cord to cable/satellite a few years ago and were using an older LG 43" TV with an OTA antenna on our roof.  We're about 35 miles from the TV towers in downtown Chicago and picked up all the major channels (and then some) on the LG.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: lakerunr
review_detail.title: Nice bedroom TV
review_detail.content: I like the Roku interface, using our set with WIFI only, for now. Fairly simple interface, my wife can use it easily. Good picture quality for small edge-lit LCD panel. Brightness won't knock you socks off. HDR OK, Dolby Vision not a noticeable difference from HDR10 (I have a 2017 LG OLED 65" for main TV, so probably biased unfairly on picture quality). Internal speakers not bad for bedroom, I would recommend an Atmos soundbar with woofer, minimum, for any other room.

Product: TCL 43S517 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2018 Model)

review_detail.author: Calazon
review_detail.title: TCL is going to make the competitors better.
review_detail.content: After 1 month, so far so good. Very nice picture quality for the money, but poor off angle. Sound as good a it gets without a sound bar. Easy set up. The one downside is the cheap leg stands that give no confidence about this TV tipping over. If you have kids or pets in the house you need to be aware that a moderate bump will topple it over. As of now, best TV in this price rating.
